00048 void
00049 GenericTPGVcs::setup (uint n, uint v, uint time)
00050 {
00051     vcs =v;
00052     no_nodes = n;
00053     max_sim_time = time;
00054     address = myId();
00055     node_ip = address/3;
00056     last_vc = 0;
00057     
00058     packets = 0;
00059     packets_in = 0;
00060     min_pkt_latency = 999999999;
00061     last_packet_out_cycle = 0;
00062     fwd_path_delay = 0;
00063     roundTripLat = 0;
00064     stat_round_trip_hop_count = 0;
00065     stat_round_trip_network_latency = 0;
00066     stat_round_trip_memory_latency = 0;
00067     stat_waiting_in_ni = 0;
00068     TotalBLP = 0;       
00069 
00070     ready.resize( vcs );
00071     ready.insert( ready.begin(), ready.size(), false );
00072     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < ready.size(); i++)
00073         ready[i] = false;
00074     lastSentTime = 0;
00075     Addr_t addr;
00076     uint thread_id;
00077     Time time2;
00078     uint cmd;   
00079 
00080 //    InitMSHR();
00081 #ifdef USE_MSHR    
00082     mshrHandler = new MSHR_H(); 
00083     mshrHandler->id = node_ip;
00084     mshrHandler->parent = this; 
00085 #endif    
00086  //   mc->stats->doneOnce[i] = &mshrHandler[i].done; 
00087     trace_filename = &mshrHandler->trace_filename; 
00088     mshrHandler->filename = const_cast<char*>(trace_name.c_str());      
00089 
00090     trace_filename->open(trace_name.c_str(),ios::in);
00091     if(!trace_filename->is_open())
00092     {
00093         cout << "Err opening trace " << trace_name << endl;
00094         exit(1);
00095     }
00096 
00097 #ifdef USE_MSHR
00098     if (!trace_filename->eof())
00099     {
00100         (*trace_filename) >> hex >> addr;
00101         (*trace_filename) >> thread_id; 
00102         (*trace_filename) >> dec >> time2;
00103         (*trace_filename) >> dec >> cmd;
00104 
00105         addr= addr & 0xffffffc0;
00106         
00107         Request *req2 = new Request();
00108         req2->cmdType = (cache_command)cmd;
00109         req2->address = addr;
00110         req2->arrivalTime = time2;
00111         req2->threadId = node_ip;
00112         req2->address = mshrHandler->GlobalAddrMap(req2->address,req2->threadId);
00113 
00114         IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00115         event->src = this;
00116         event->dst = (Component*)(mshrHandler);
00117         event->type = 0;
00118         event->event_data.push_back(req2);      
00119 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00120         cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << req2->address << ": First Request of each trace to be send to mshrs" << endl; 
00121 #endif
00122         Simulator::Schedule(time2, &MSHR_H::process_event, (MSHR_H*)event->dst, event);   
00123     }
00124     /* send ready events for each virtual channel*/
00125 #endif
00126 
00127     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < vcs; i++ )
00128     {
00129         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00130         event->type = READY_EVENT;
00131         event->vc = i;
00132         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event,this, event);
00133 // interface_connections[0], event);
00134     }
00135 
00136 
00137     return ;
00138 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::setup ----- */

00165 
00166 void
00167 GenericTPGVcs::process_event (IrisEvent* e)
00168 {
00169     switch(e->type)
00170     {
00171         case NEW_PACKET_EVENT:
00172             handle_new_packet_event(e);
00173             break;
00174         case OUT_PULL_EVENT:
00175             handle_out_pull_event(e);
00176             break;
00177         case READY_EVENT:
00178             handle_ready_event(e);
00179             break;
00180         default:
00181             cout << "\nTPG: " << address << "process_event: UNK event type" << endl;
00182             break;
00183     }
00184     return ;
00185 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::process_event ----- */
00186 
00187 void
00188 GenericTPGVcs::handle_new_packet_event ( IrisEvent* e)
00189 {
00190     ni_recv = false;
00191     // get the packet data
00192     HighLevelPacket* hlp = static_cast< HighLevelPacket* >( e->event_data.at(0));
00193     double lat = Simulator::Now() - hlp->sent_time;
00194     last_packet_out_cycle = Simulator::Now();
00195     if( min_pkt_latency > lat)
00196         min_pkt_latency = lat;
00197     packets_in++;
00198     stat_round_trip_hop_count += hlp->hop_count;
00199     stat_round_trip_network_latency += (ullint)hlp->avg_network_latency;
00200     stat_round_trip_memory_latency += hlp->stat_memory_serviced_time;
00201     stat_waiting_in_ni += hlp->waiting_in_ni;
00202 #ifdef DEBUG
00203     _DBG( "-------------- TPG GOT NEW PACKET ---------------\n pkt_latency: %f", lat);
00204     // write out the packet data to the output trace file
00205     if( !out_file.is_open() )
00206         out_file.open( out_filename.c_str(), std::ios_base::app );
00207       
00208         out_file << hlp->toString();
00209         out_file << "\tPkt latency: " << lat << endl;
00210 #endif
00211 
00212 #ifdef USE_MSHR
00213     Request * req = new Request();
00214     convertFromBitStream(req,hlp);              
00215     req->startTime = hlp->req_start_time;
00216     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00217     event->src = (Component*)this;
00218     event->dst = (Component*)mshrHandler;
00219     event->type = MSHR_DELETE;  
00220     event->event_data.push_back(req);   
00221 #ifdef DEBUG   
00222     _DBG( " Got at TPG newpkt: %llx",req->address);
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00226         cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << req->address << ": Sending to MSHR for Delete" << endl;       
00227 #endif
00228     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &MSHR_H::process_event, (MSHR_H*)event->dst, event);        
00229 #endif
00230 
00231     delete hlp;
00232 
00233     // send back a ready event
00234     IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00235     event2->type = READY_EVENT;
00236     event2->vc = hlp->virtual_channel;
00237     Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, interface_connections[0], event2);
00238 
00239 
00240     delete e;
00241     return ;
00242 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::handle_new_packet_event ----- */

00244 void
00245 GenericTPGVcs::handle_out_pull_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00246 {
00247     sending =false;
00248     bool found = false;
00249     uint sending_vc = -1;
00250     uint old_last_vc = last_vc;
00251     for( uint i=last_vc+1; i<vcs; i++)
00252     {
00253         if(ready[i])
00254         {
00255             found = true;
00256             sending_vc = i;
00257             last_vc = i;
00258             break;
00259         }
00260     }
00261     if ( !found)
00262     {
00263         for ( uint i=0; i<=last_vc; i++)
00264         {
00265             if(ready[i])
00266             {
00267                 found = true;
00268                 sending_vc = i;
00269                 last_vc = i;
00270                 break;
00271             }
00272         }
00273     }
00274     if( found )
00275     {
00276 #ifdef USE_MSHR
00277         Request* next_req = GetRequest();
00278 #else
00279         Request* next_req = GetNextRequest();
00280 #endif
00281         if( next_req)
00282         {
00283             packets++;
00284             fwd_path_delay += (ullint)(Simulator::Now() - next_req->arrivalTime);
00285             HighLevelPacket* hlp = new HighLevelPacket();
00286             hlp->virtual_channel = sending_vc;
00287             hlp->source = node_ip;
00288             hlp->destination = next_req->mcNo;
00289             hlp->addr = next_req->address;
00290             hlp->transaction_id = 1000;
00291             if( hlp->destination == node_ip )
00292                 hlp->destination = 3; //(hlp->destination + 1) % max_nodes;
00293 
00294             convertToBitStream(next_req, hlp);
00295             if(hlp->sent_time < Simulator::Now())
00296                 hlp->sent_time = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+1;
00297             hlp->req_start_time = next_req->startTime;
00298 
00299 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00300             assert ( hlp->destination < no_nodes);
00301             _DBG( " Sending at TPG out pull: VC %d dest:%d ad:%llx mshr size: %d", sending_vc, hlp->destination
00302                   ,next_req->address, mshrHandler->mshr.size());
00303             cout << "HLP: " << hlp->toString() << endl;
00304             _DBG( " Sending pkt: no of packets %d %llx", packets, next_req->address );
00305 #endif
00306             ready[sending_vc] = false;
00307             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00308             event->type = NEW_PACKET_EVENT;
00309             event->event_data.push_back(hlp);
00310             event->vc = sending_vc;
00311             Simulator::Schedule( hlp->sent_time, &NetworkComponent::process_event, interface_connections[0], event );
00312             sending = true;
00313             delete next_req;
00314             lastSentTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00315 
00316         }
00317         else
00318         {
00319             last_vc = old_last_vc;
00320             sending = true;
00321         }
00322     }
00323 
00324 /* 
00325     if( Simulator::Now()-lastSentTime > 1000000 )
00326     {
00327         cout << " ******* Deaslock detected ****** " << endl;
00328         cout << " TPG " << node_ip << endl;
00329         cout << " last_packet_out_cycle: " << last_packet_out_cycle << endl;
00330         cout << " SimNow: " << Simulator::Now() << endl;
00331         cout << " mshrsize: " << mshrHandler->mshr.size() << endl;
00332         
00333         for (unsigned int i=0; i<mshrHandler->mshr.size(); i++)
00334             cout << mshrHandler->mshr[i].address << endl;
00335 //        for ( uint i=0; i<64; i++)
00336 //            static_cast<GenericRouterVcs*>(mesh->routers[i])->dump_ib_state();
00337         exit(1);
00338     }
00339  * */
00340     if( sending)
00341     {
00342         IrisEvent* event2 = new IrisEvent();
00343         event2->type = OUT_PULL_EVENT;
00344         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event2);
00345         sending = true;
00346     }           
00347     delete e; 
00348 }

00350 void
00351 GenericTPGVcs::handle_ready_event ( IrisEvent* e)
00352 {
00353 
00354     if ( e->vc > vcs )
00355     {
00356         _DBG(" Got ready for vc %d no_vcs %d ", e->vc, vcs);
00357         exit(1);
00358     }
00359     // send the next packet if it is less than the current time
00360     ready[e->vc] = true;
00361     if( !sending && Simulator::Now() < max_sim_time )
00362     {
00363         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00364         event->type = OUT_PULL_EVENT;
00365         event->vc = e->vc; 
00366         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00367         sending = true;
00368     }
00369 
00370     delete e;
00371     return ;
00372 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::handle_ready_event ----- */
00373 Request*
00374 GenericTPGVcs::GetNextRequest()
00375 {
00376     Addr_t addr =0;
00377     uint thread_id = 0;
00378     Time time = 0;
00379     uint cmd;
00380 
00381     if (trace_filename->eof())
00382         return NULL;
00383 
00384     else
00385     {
00386         Request* tempRequest = new Request();
00387         (*trace_filename) >> hex >> addr;
00388         (*trace_filename) >> thread_id;
00389         (*trace_filename) >>dec>> time;
00390         (*trace_filename) >>dec>> cmd;
00391 
00392         tempRequest->cmdType = (cache_command)cmd;
00393         tempRequest->address = addr;
00394         tempRequest->arrivalTime = time;        
00395         tempRequest->threadId = node_ip;
00396         tempRequest->address = mshrHandler->GlobalAddrMap(tempRequest->address,tempRequest->threadId);
00397 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00398         cout << "\n Created Req: "
00399             << "\t cmd: " << cmd
00400             << "\t thr_id: " << thread_id
00401             << "\t time: " << time
00402             << "\t addr: " << addr
00403             << endl;
00404 #endif
00405 
00406         return tempRequest;
00407     }
00408 
00409 }
00410 
00411 bool
00412 GenericTPGVcs::GetNewRequest(Request *req)
00413 {
00414     if (!mshrHandler->writeQueue.empty())
00415     {
00416         if (mshrHandler->writeQueue[0].arrivalTime <= Simulator::Now())
00417         {
00418             vector<Request>::iterator bufferIndex = mshrHandler->writeQueue.begin();
00419             *req = mshrHandler->writeQueue[0];
00420             //req->startTime = Simulator::Now();        
00421             mshrHandler->writeQueue.erase(bufferIndex);
00422             return true;
00423         }
00424     }
00425     else  if (!mshrHandler->mshr.empty() && mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex < mshrHandler->mshr.size())
00426     {
00427         if (mshrHandler->mshr[mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex].arrivalTime <= Simulator::Now())
00428         {
00429             *req = mshrHandler->mshr[mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex];
00430             mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex++;
00431 //            TotalBLP += mshrHandler->countBLP(*req);
00432             return true;
00433         }
00434     }
00435     if (mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex > mshrHandler->mshr.size())
00436     {
00437         cout << "\nERROR: lastIndex greater" << mshrHandler->lastScheduledIndex << " " << mshrHandler->mshr.size() << endl;
00438         exit(1);
00439     }
00440     return false;
00441 }
00442 
00443 Request*
00444 GenericTPGVcs::GetRequest()
00445 {
00446     Request* req = new Request();
00447     if (GetNewRequest(req))
00448     {
00449         return req;
00450     }
00451     delete req;
00452     return NULL;
00453 }
00454 
00455 void
00456 GenericTPGVcs::convertToBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket* hlp)
00457 {
00458     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS ; i++ )
00459     {
00460         bool bit = (bool)((req->address >> i) & 0x1);
00461         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00462     }
00463     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS ; i++ )
00464     {
00465         bool bit = (bool)((req->cmdType >> i) & 0x1);
00466         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00467     }
00468     for ( uint i=0 ; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS ; i++ )
00469     {
00470         bool bit = (bool)((req->threadId >> i) & 0x1);
00471         hlp->data.push_back(bit);
00472     }
00473     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITEBACK)
00474     {   for ( uint i = hlp->data.size() ; i < (8*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE - max_phy_link_bits); i++ )
00475         {
00476             hlp->data.push_back(true);
00477         }
00478         hlp->msg_class = WRITE_REQ;
00479     }
00480     else
00481         hlp->msg_class = ONE_FLIT_REQ;
00482 
00483 
00484     hlp->data_payload_length = uint(ceil(hlp->data.size() *1.0 / max_phy_link_bits));   
00485     hlp->data_payload_length = hlp->data_payload_length * max_phy_link_bits;
00486     hlp->sent_time = req->arrivalTime;
00487     for ( uint i=hlp->data.size() ; i < hlp->data_payload_length; i++ )
00488         hlp->data.push_back(false);
00489 
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00493 void 
00494 GenericTPGVcs::convertFromBitStream(Request* req, HighLevelPacket *hlp)
00495 {
00496     req->address = 0;   
00497     req->mcNo=hlp->source;
00498     for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS; i++)
00499     {
00500         req->address = req->address | (hlp->data[i] << i);
00501     }
00502     /*    unsigned int temp = 0;
00503           for (unsigned int i = 0; i < NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS; i++)
00504           {
00505           temp = temp | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS] << i);
00506           }
00507           req->cmdType = (Command_t)temp;
00508 
00509           req->threadId = 0;
00510           for (unsigned int i=0; i < NETWORK_THREADID_BITS; i++)
00511           {
00512           req->threadId = req->threadId | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS+NETWORK_COMMAND_BITS] << i);
00513           }
00514      */
00515 
00516     req->data.value = 0;
00517     if (req->cmdType == CACHE_READ || req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITE || req->cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH)
00518         for ( uint i = NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS; i < (8*CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE - max_phy_link_bits); i++ )
00519         {
00520             req->data.value = req->data.value | (hlp->data[i+NETWORK_ADDRESS_BITS] << i);
00521             req->data.size = CACHE_BLOCK_SIZE;
00522         }
00523 }

00525 string
00526 GenericTPGVcs::toString () const
00527 {
00528     stringstream str;
00529     str << "\nGenericTPGVcs: "
00530         << "\t trace: " << trace_name
00531         << "\t vcs: " << ready.size()
00532         << "\t address: " <<address
00533         << "\t node_ip: " << node_ip
00534         ;
00535     return str.str();
00536 } /*  ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::toString ----- */
00537 
00538 string
00539 GenericTPGVcs::print_stats() const
00540 {
00541     stringstream str;
00542     str << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] packets_out:\t" << packets
00543         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_fwd_path_delay:\t" << (fwd_path_delay+0.0)/packets
00544         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] min_pkt_latency:\t" << min_pkt_latency
00545         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] last_packet_out_cycle:\t" << last_packet_out_cycle
00546         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] packet_in:\t" << packets_in
00547         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_round_trip_latency:\t" << (roundTripLat+0.0)/packets_in
00548         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_blp:\t" << (TotalBLP+0.0)/packets
00549         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] total_unsink:\t" << mshrHandler->unsink
00550         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_round_trip_hop_count:\t" << (stat_round_trip_hop_count+0.0)/packets_in
00551         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_round_trip_network_latency:\t" << (stat_round_trip_network_latency+0.0)/packets_in
00552         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_round_trip_memory_latency:\t" << (stat_round_trip_memory_latency+0.0)/packets_in
00553         << "\nTPG [" << node_ip << "] avg_round_trip_waiting_in_ni:\t" << (stat_waiting_in_ni+0.0)/packets_in
00554         ;
00555     return str.str();
00556 } /* ----- end of function GenericTPGVcs::toString ----- */
